Package cz.kinst.jakub.coursemanager

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AssignmentCorrect
    Activity providing interface for course assignment correction.
    AssignmentDetail
    Activity showing detail of an assignment.
    Assignments
    Activity showing list of assignments time-ordered
    AssignmentSolve
    Activity showing Assignment solve form
    CMActivity
    Base CourseManager Activity Extends TabbedActivity - provides tab functionality if needed Provides simple AsyncTask which should do the main Activity work.
    Course
    Activity showing course homepage provides menu buttons for redirection to course-related activities
    CourseList
    Activity showing list of user's courses divided into Teacher's courses and Student's courses depending on user's role in the course
    CourseManagerConnector
    Class extending AndroidetteConnector, which implements CourseManager-specific requirements.
    Events
    Activity showing list of course events.
    Forum
    Activity showing list of forum topics of the course
    ForumReplies
    Activity showing forum thread - topic with related replies
    Lesson
    Activity showing detail page of a Lesson Uses tab interface: Tab 1: Lesson Comments Tab 2: Lesson Resources
    Messages
    Messages Activity shows Incoming and Outgoing messages for logged user Activity uses tabs Tab 1: Inbox Tab 2: Outbox
    MessagesNew
    Activity with a form for composing and sending new Message
    MessagesShow
    Activity shows message detail - content Provides option to reply to the message
    R  
    R.attr  
    R.drawable  
    R.id  
    R.layout  
    R.menu  
    R.string  
    R.style  
    R.xml  
    Resources
    Activity showing course-related resources user can download file to device by clicking on it in the list
    Results
    Activity offering a table of Student's results in a course
    Settings
    Settings Activity extends standard Android PreferenceActivity Loads settings structure from XML resource
